alert.note: Alert for Cass; Kosciusko; Miami; Wabash; Whitley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 10:07AM EDT until March 25 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... Eel River at North Manchester affecting Miami, Wabash, Kosciusko, Whitley and Cass IN Counties. .Locally heavy rainfall near 2 inches over the last 12 hours will likely lead to minor flooding. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Eel River at North Manchester. * WHEN...From this evening to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, The river is at flood stage, minor agricultural flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 9.6 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage to 11.2 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight to 9.9 feet early Saturday morning. It will rise to 10.2 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further statements and updated forecasts. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
